fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose two players each night. Dig a Trench in the first player's yard, and Pile all that dirt onto the second player's yard.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Trenches and Piles last two nights, including the night that they're made.
- If a Trench and a Pile is on the same yard, they will cancel each other out and have no effect.
- If a player's yard has a Trench, one of their visitors will be roleblocked at random.
- If a player's yard has a Pile, they will have Astral Immunity - Astral abilities will count as visits when used against that player.
- You are immune to Trenches and Piles.
- Players will not be notified when Trenches and Piles are left in their yard.
